Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its high value and exceptional quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special price of $14,000. This offer is designed to provide you with an excellent value while ensuring you benefit from the superior features and performance that our product offers. Please let us know if you have any questions or require additional information to make an informed decision. We look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
